mapper.select: select recru.*,plan.PLAN_NO,plan.PLAN_NAME from hr_recruit_recruitment recru left join hr_recruit_plan plan on recru.PLAN_NO=plan.PLAN_NO
select recru.*,plan.PLAN_NO,plan.PLAN_NAME from hr_recruit_recruitment recru left join hr_recruit_plan plan on recru.PLAN_NO=plan.PLAN_NO where RECRUITMENT_ID=#{recruitmentId}

select filter.FILTER_ID,filter.EMPLOYEE_NAME from hr_recruit_filter filter LEFT JOIN hr_recruit_plan plan on filter.PLAN_NO=plan.PLAN_NO where filter.END_FLAG=1
and filter.PLAN_NO = #{planNo}
and filter.PASS_OR_NOT1=1
- and filter.PASS_OR_NOT2=1
